tweetSentenceList.constTree: (ROOT (S (NP (NP (NN Rise)) (PP (IN of) (NP (NP (DT the) (NN planet)) (PP (IN of) (NP (DT the) (NNS apes)))))) (VP (VBZ has) (NP (PRP$ my) (NN heart)) (ADVP (RB eternally))) (. .)))
